title: attack-pattern
description: The Attack Pattern object is a STIX TLO that describes a general approach for attacking a system or network. In addition to the standard TTP properties, it has a reference to a CAPEC (Common Attack Pattern Enumeration and Classification - http://capec.mitre.org/) ID

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `attack-pattern`.

title.description: A name or short description used to identify this Attack Pattern.

description.description: A description that provides the recipient with context about this Attack Pattern.

kill_chain_phases.description: The list of kill chain phases for which this attack pattern is used.

external_references.description: A list of external-reference objects which refer to non-STIX information.
